channel.title: Grave : The Indie Horror Game
channel.description:
Anyone heard of it? It seems really cool and the idea is fantastic. I watched a gameplay video and I thought that it was a very well thought out game.
It is Indie, and after looking around the download, it appears to be made in Unity haha. They have the free beta for Windows on download but this is missing content and has bugs of course, but basically it is a teaser, the game is still frightening and confusing!
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZAy3elrtpE[/youtube]
